name: Portable-UTF-8-Documentation
description: Documentation for Portable UTF-8 for PHP.

scripts.docs:do: gitbook install && rm -rf _book && gitbook build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add --all && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push https://github.com/voku/portable-utf8.git gh-pages --force

author: Lars Moelleken <lars@moelleken.org> (https://moelleken.org)
